price: ߕߟߋ߬ߓߐ ߣߌ߫ ߕߟߋ߬ߓߋ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߋ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߜߘߍ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߞߐ߫ ߸ ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߌ ߦߴߏ߬ ߡߌ߬ߘߊ߬ ߌ ߛߍ߲߬ߓߍ߬ߟߊ߲߫ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi lā ilāha illā huwa fa-ittakhidh'hu wakīlan
